issue.title: [Python] Fix numpydoc validation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12645](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12645). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We haven't started to use the numpydoc validation feature of archery yet. We should start to utilize it so we can ensure all parameters are covered with docstrings.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12645?focusedCommentId=17341989) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10241
